Translations.Text: jaenan-i ingan-ege ileulttaemyeon junim-eul hyanghayeo buleuna geubunkkeseo geulohayeo eunhyeleul masboge hal ttaemyeon bola geudeuljung-ui mulineun junim anin daleun usang-eul sungbaehanila
